_Info: This is the JSON based Configuration for Delay-StartUp
RunItems are your Startup items you are delaying
HostOnly is defined as the only host you want it to run on.

Setup._Base: [string] The starting folder that Delay-StartUp reads from.
Setup._Editor: [string] The Text Editor you would like to use.
Setup._StartDelay: [int] Determines How many seconds to delay the start of loading.
Setup._Delay: [int] Defines the delay between each program run.
Setup._Prevent: [bool] If true skips running completely (in case your working on the system.
Setup._Notify: [bool] If Notifications should be sent to asay/notify.
Setup._TestRun: [bool] 0 for normal 1 to test run script without loading any programs.
Setup._WPosition: [bool] 0 for normal 1 to test run script without loading any programs.
Setup._WinX: [int] Position from the LEFT of the actual outer window. Use to position window on screen
Setup._WinY: [int] Position from the TOP of the actual outer window. Use to position window on screen
Setup._WinSMX: [int] Position from the LEFT of the Settings Manager outer window. Use to position window on screen
Setup._WinSMY: [int] Position from the TOP of the Settings Manager outer window. Use to position window on screen
